sentences.sentence: Clone and express bradyzoite antigen 1(BAG1) gene of T. gondii, and analyze the immunoreactivity of the recombinant product.
sentences.translation: 克隆与表达弓形虫缓殖子期特异性抗原1（BAG1）的基因，并分析重组抗原的免疫反应性。

sentences.sentence: All samples showed similar immunoreactivity profiles.
sentences.translation: 所有样本显示，类似的免疫档案。

sentences.sentence: No COX-2 immunoreactivity was observed in normal cerebellar tissue.
sentences.translation: 正常小脑组织标本中未发现COX - 2的表达。
